You need me all the way

Last, last (The last to know)
Last, last (The last to know)
Last, last (The last to know)
Last, last (The last to know)

[Chorus]

Ooh, yeah, yeah

Don't, just let me be the one
Don't hold back, just let it go
I need to hear you say
You need me all the way
So baby, if you love me, let me be the last to know
